00048         float fOffsetX=1, float fOffsetY=1, float fOffsetZ=1,
00049         float fScaleX=1, float fScaleY=1, float fScaleZ=1,
00050         unsigned int uiGridResolution = 150,
00051         unsigned long iSeed=1234);
00052 
00053     virtual ~SpVertexNoiseSb();
00054 
00056 public:
00057 
00058     void initialize();
00059     void destroy();
00060     void preload();

00063 
00064     virtual void setScale( float fX, float fY, float fZ )
00065     {
00066         m_fScaleX = fX;
00067         m_fScaleY = fY;
00068         m_fScaleZ = fZ;
00069         m_bHasChanged = true;
00070     }
00071 
00072     virtual void getScale( float& rfX, float& rfY, float& rfZ ) const
00073     {
00074         rfX = m_fScaleX;
00075         rfY = m_fScaleY;
00076         rfZ = m_fScaleZ;
00077     }
00078 
00079     virtual void setOffset( float fX, float fY, float fZ )
00080     {
00081         m_fOffsetX = fX;
00082         m_fOffsetY = fY;
00083         m_fOffsetZ = fZ;
00084         m_bHasChanged = true;
00085     }
00086 
00087     virtual void getOffset( float& rfX, float& rfY, float& rfZ ) const
00088     {
00089         rfX = m_fOffsetX;
00090         rfY = m_fOffsetY;
00091         rfZ = m_fOffsetZ;
00092     }
00093 
00094     virtual void setWeight( float fWeight )
00095     {
00096         m_fWeight = fWeight;
00097         m_bHasChanged = true;
00098     }
00099 
00100     virtual float getWeight() const
00101     {
00102         return m_fWeight;
00103     }
00104 
00105     inline void setGridResolution( unsigned int uiResolution )
00106     {
00107         m_kGrid.setResolution( uiResolution, uiResolution );
00108         m_bHasChanged = true;
00109     }
00110 
00111     inline SpGlslVertexProgram* program()
00112     { return m_pkVertexProgram; }

00116
